uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc

Class DefaultDataBaseService

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.DefaultDataBaseService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppContextCleanup, AppContextService<DatabaseService>, Contexed, DatabaseService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JNDIDatabaseService

    public class DefaultDataBaseService
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseService
    Default implementation of the DatabaseService This gets connection parameters from the ConfigService but this is only queried at the point where a database connection is required. The following config parameters are read:
    • db_name[.tag] connection url
    • db_type[.tag] connection type [mysql or postgres]
    • db_name[.tag] connection url
    Author:
    spb
